duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing manufacturing processes and testing batch quality.
Maintaining equipment logbooks and ensuring clean work area.
Identifying faults, suggesting manufacturing improvements, and conducting quality checks.
Setting up and adjusting various machines, troubleshooting production issues, and repairing machinery.
Assisting with material handling, managing high-priority packaging materials, and performing routine maintenance on machines.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma preferred, along with 1 year of machine operating experience.
